Name: BestCrossVal
Description: Module for saving the TrainingEpisode with the lowest cross validation error. Saves the instance and index of the episode

Properties.Name: bestCrossVal
Properties.Description: The lowest cross validation error recorded.

Properties.Name: bestIndex
Properties.Description: Index of the best performing TrainingEpisode

Properties.Name: bestTrainingEpisode
Properties.Description: Pointer to the best performing TrainingEpisode.

Functions.Name: startOfEpisode

MandatoryArgs.Name: episodeIndex
MandatoryArgs.Description: Index of the episode. Used for referring to TrainingEpisode generation parameters.

Functions.Description: Is called at the beginning of each TrainingEpisode run.

Functions.Name: endOfCrossVal
Functions.Description: Is called at end of cross validation. Cross val compared to min crossVal.
